transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello Shanu ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ha boliye.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, Shana baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Executive: Accha accha ha boliye.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji. Aapne sir ye jo complaint kari thi aap aap sir dusre number se login karne ka koshish kar rahe ho kya sir?
Customer: Ha nahi dusre number se same number se hi login kiya hai.
Executive: Same number se bhi login kar rahe ho aap to kya issue kya matlab kya aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Nahi wo issue nahi hai hum actually jo UI hai na pehla wala upar mein.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To UI mein bina login karke udhar details thoda aa raha tha.
Customer: Matlab lead manager show nahi ho raha tha par wo kitna lead manager hai isme kitna hai ye sab details dikha raha tha.
Executive: To aap aap abhi sir video meeting pe aa sakte ho ek baar aap sir screen present karke check karwa sakte ho sir?
Customer: Hmm okay ek minute.
Executive: Aap check karo sir maine na aapko video meeting ka link share kar diya hai.
Executive: Aapke mail pe gayi hogi sir.
Executive: Aap bologe to mai aapko sir whatsapp pe bhi share kar du?
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Join kar lo.
Executive: Ji mai aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Ha bol raha hu ki join kar lo meeting mein. 
Executive: Ha ha aap join kijiye.
(silence)
(hold music)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issue with login.

- UI showing details without login.



Resolution:

- Executive shared video meeting link to check.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer to join video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login issue, ui, video meeting
